dialogue_entries.dialogue_text: Hello let us start. This Nomad is making streams of water flow...
You are creating a river, where water will run through.
Start by clicking on the ground near the blue circle.
Now right-click to undo the last circle selection.
Let's make a path to the cow that needs water.
You cannot go through the tree, so you will have to go around.
Your goal is to make it to animals that need water,
Using the energy you have available to you.
Let's get water to the cattle!
